abstract: The death certificate for Steven P. Jobs says he died at home of respiratory arrest caused by a pancreatic tumor.
snippet: The death certificate for Steven P. Jobs says he died at home of respiratory arrest caused by a pancreatic tumor.
lead_paragraph: Steven P. Jobs died at home in Palo Alto, Calif., of respiratory arrest caused by a pancreatic tumor at about 3 p.m. on Wednesday, according to his death certificate.

headline.main: Jobs’s Cause of Death Is Released by Coroner
headline.print_headline: Coroner Gives Cause of Death For Steve Jobs
